In Zambia, reductions in maternal 
mortality were monitored through routine 
identification and investigation of deaths 
that occurred in facilities before and during 
SMGL Phase 1. (See later sections of this 
report, Maternal and Perinatal Outcomes 
in Health Facilities, for more detail.)
